name: 楊勝明
objective: 本課程為基礎電力電子學各種轉換器電路的實習，內容包括：(1)AC-DC轉換器實習，(2)Boost DC-DC轉換器實習，(3) Buck DC-DC轉換器實習，(4) Flyback DC-DC轉換器實習(5)全橋式DC-DC轉換器實習，(6) 全橋式DC-AC轉換器。
schedule:
1.   Introduction
2.   laboratory equipment
3.   DC-AC converter, Bridge rectifier (Lab 1)
4.   Boost DC-DC converter (Lab 2)
5.   Experiments (小考)
6.   No class
7.   Buck DC-DC converter (Lab 3)
8.   Experiments (小考)
9.   Mid-Exam week
10. Boost PFC (Lab 4)
11. Experiments (小考)
12. Flyback DC-DC converter (Lab 5)
13. Experiments (小考)
14. Introduction of Arduino
15. Full-bridge DC-DC converter (Lab 6)
16. Experiments (小考)
17. Full-bridge DC-AC inverter(Lab 7)
18. Final exam week
materials:
Text: Class notes
Reference:"Power Electronics", Daniel Hart, McGraw Hill, 東華書局
